{{Wired embedded system |brand=Promise |model=Apollo Cloud |revision=2TB (PTN5001) |asin=B0728GRRLP |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |price=200 |est_release_date=02/2017 |pcb_id=G450402HFCAA300 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6810;88F6-BRT4, 88F6810-A0; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q16CLSQ |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83GFR-RDC |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;Global Mixed-Mode Tech;G547G;;2;,,, 1.5A Fast Transient Response Linear Regulator;ANPEC;APL5336;;1;,,, 17V 8A Synchronous Step Down Converter w/ Hiccup;TI;TPS54821;;1;,,, 20V P-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc;DMP2022L;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.01;Marvell v.2015 T1.0p5; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.70; }} {{TagLine|Promise Apollo Personal Cloud Storage}} :[https://www.promise.com/DownloadFile.aspx?DownloadFileUID=4417 Product manual]
"PROMISE", "TECHNOLOGIES INC.", "AUGUSTA Controller Board", "GP 1526-01 REV A3", :and "G450402HFCAA300" are silkscreened on the board. *''Promise Technology'' Apollo Personal Cloud Storage 2TB â€Ž(PRMAPOLLO-02TB) {{See also|Promise}}
===Links=== *[https://www.macworld.com/article/229574/apollo-cloud-review-a-personal-cloud-storage-alternative-to-icloud-photo-library.html ''Apollo Cloud review'' on '''MacWorld'''] *[https://www.macrumors.com/review/review-promise-technology-apollo/ ''Review: Promise Technology's Apollo Offers Private Cloud Storage'' on '''MacRumours''']
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6810 @1.0GHz :''Armada 380'' ARM (Cortex-A9) *Storage: 2MB Serial (NOR) Flash, :128MB (NAND) Flash, 2TB SATA 3.0 *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports :(one inaccessible w/ case) *Power: 12V/3A via barrel plug
==Images== <gallery> File:Promise Apollo Cloud Top.jpeg|Board top File:Promise Apollo Cloud Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
